subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Mike Rice, the former Rutgers coach, was brought on as the interim head basketball coach at the Patrick School, a parochial high school powerhouse in New Jersey.
snippet: Mike Rice, the former Rutgers coach, was brought on as the interim head basketball coach at the Patrick School, a parochial high school powerhouse in New Jersey.
